mapper.insert: insert into employee (id, employee_number, name, gender, birthday, telephone, email, address, education, department_number, position_number, in_time, password, notes, deviceId, role) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{positionNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{inTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update employee
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
employee_number = #{record.employeeNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=DATE},

notes = #{record.notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

role = #{record.role,jdbcType=INTEGER},
